title: How do I get an S or S+ on Bard now lmao
body:
[End Game Screen](http://prntscr.com/d4qxv0)

So this Bard jungle game was an A+, given I never bought a pink and I was down in cs for most of the game, but holy shit my map pressure was on point

On support I only ever get S- or lower.

I've actually been stuck on my last S for mastery 7 for like half a year.

Help.

replies.body: well the last ranked game on bard you played you didnt really play support you placed like 6 wards in 29min and you didnt buy a single pink ward. grade is not just kda

We're not talking ranked here.

And my last Bard ranked game was with my friends I believe, so we were just messing around

I got level 7 Bard organically. Popped off from supp position, built a few AP items, got a sweet carry score. I think my last two tokens were for games with 12-16 kills, ~4 deaths, and 20+ assists. Very few CS due to being a support.
Masteries mean nothing if you are silver/bronze
You're only gold 5, don't pretend you're good hahaha
Says the silver 3

The s3 who played 10 ranked games.
Also the s3 who doesn't get to glorified s1 and thinks he's challenger. ;)

Congrats on you not playing ranked very often?  No one said anything about being challenger, but reaching gold 5 puts you above almost 2/3 of the entire player base so they aren't bad.  There's varying degrees of good players just like being silver 3 and bronze 5 aren't the same level of bad.
You make me happy that I don't know you, you seem incredibly annoying. :)

Because I made a reasonable point? That makes sense. You can't think of any kind of intelligent comment to say back so you just default to name calling? I get that high school can be hard, but you should really learn better social skills otherwise life is going to be really tough for you down the road.
Point proven :)
You're right, you just proved mine.
im commenting just to see how small the box can get{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
and smaller

> [{quoted}](name=Environmentalist,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YkHWKh3o,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-08T19:40:56.033+0000)
>
> Point proven :)

Wait. Youre silver 3.....Why are you talking? ._.

Just pointing out that they're only gold 5 :)
I'm only s3 because I don't enjoy ranked. I play the 10 games to get ranked and then leave it.

> [{quoted}](name=Environmentalist,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YkHWKh3o,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-11-08T18:54:26.776+0000)
>
> You're only gold 5, don't pretend you're good hahaha

Never said I was good. :P. Masteries doesnt mean shit. Dont get triggered ;) <33

Try Ap or Ad bard top lane,if oyu do well you usually get a good grade. 
Just make sure you fight in a passive/farm lane, because you will feed against any aggressive top laner like{{champion:240}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:58}}  or {{champion:27}} (singed OP)

Build {{item:3115}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3089}} and whatever else you want

Multiple people suggested Bard top, which I've done before and gotten an A no matter what I've done lol

I'll keep trying
You dont enjoy rank because you keep loosing? ._. Maybe thats why?

That's irrelevant.

We're talking normal games.
Try him top?  Or buy pink wards? Idk

I've done top before, usually still get stuck with A+ on a good game

I was going to buy pinks this game but I never had the gold to do it with how my backs went
Lack of CS, lack of wards, and potentially drags/tower kills.
i need one more S on him for level 7
meanwhile soon ill be having 15 mastery 7's champs xD
